usage.cn: 积极的态度会带来积极的结果，因为态度是具有感染力的。
usage.eng: A positive attitude will have positive results,because attitudes are contagious.

usage.cn: 幸福不是取决于外界环境，它由我们的心态来决定。戴尔卡耐基（Dale Carnegie）
usage.eng: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.

usage.cn: 生活中难免遭遇打击。但是，真正能把你击倒的是你的态度。
usage.eng: Life always has many things to bring you down. But, what can really bring you down is your attitude.

usage.cn: 如果你不喜欢某件事，就改变它；如果你不能改变它，就改变你的态度。不要抱怨。 玛雅.安热卢
usage.eng: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude. Don't complain.
